tools

Class DataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.DataBase

  • public class DataBase
extends java.lang.Object
    DataBase class is responsible for managing all the serialized information related to the UnDupeKeeper for later use.
    Author:
    vliopard

    • Method Detail

      • useWorker

        public static void useWorker(Worker worker)
        This method receives a running worker to handle their information that will be persisted.
        Parameters:
        worker - A Worker thread to get its hash map of processing values.

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        This method just clear the hash map serialized data with a new fresh object without any values.

      • saveMap

        public static void saveMap(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hashMapToSave)
        This method saves a hash map of working values to the file system for later use.
        Parameters:
        hashMapToSave - A HashMap of Strings containing the values to be written to the disk.

      • loadMap

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> loadMap()
        This method restores a previous saved session containing all the data already worked.
        Returns:
        Returns a HashMap of Strings containing an Encrypted representation and its file path location.

      • saveDir

        public static void saveDir(java.lang.String folderName)
        This method saves the dialog chooser's directory to remember the last place you visit.
        Parameters:
        folderName - A String containing the path to the dialog chooser's directory.

      • loadDir

        public static java.lang.String loadDir()
        This method restores the last saved directory selected by the dialog chooser.
        Returns:
        Returns a String that contains the path to a saved serialized Directory.

      • loadLanguageIndex

        public static int loadLanguageIndex()
        This method informs the last language index selected by the settings dialog.
        Returns:
        Returns an int that contains the language index to be used.

      • loadLanguage

        public static java.lang.String loadLanguage()
        This method informs the last language selected by the settings dialog.
        Returns:
        Returns a String that contains the language to be used.

      • saveSettings

        public static void saveSettings(SettingsHandler settingsTransfer)
        This method saves all settings obtained from the settings dialog.
        Parameters:
        settingsTransfer - A SettingsHandler object containing the software settings to be saved to disk.

      • loadSettings

        public static SettingsHandler loadSettings()
        This method restores all dialog settings previously saved to the disk.
        Returns:
        Returns a SettingsHandler object that contains previous serialized saved settings.

      • openSettings

        public static boolean openSettings()
        This method displays the settings dialog window containing all changeable UndupeKeeper settings.
        Returns:
        Returns true if settings were changed and confirmed. Returns false if dialog is canceled or closed.

      • chooseDir

        public static java.lang.String chooseDir()
        This method displays the Directory Chooser Dialog for selecting a directory to be handled by UnDupeKeeper.
        Returns:
        Returns a String that contains the selected directory path from dialog box. Returns null if dialog box is closed without selecting a Directory.

      • log

        private static void log(java.lang.String logMessage)
        This method displays a log message through the embedded log system.
        Parameters:
        logMessage - A String containing the log message to display.

      • msg

        private static void msg(java.lang.String message)
        This method displays a message through the embedded log system.
        Parameters:
        message - A String containing the message to display.
